suncertify.client.view
Class MainWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      suncertify.client.view.MainWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, View, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements View

The main application window containing a menu, a toolbar, a TablePanel on the right with a JTable in a JScrollView, a FilterPanel on left top to filter data, a BookPanel on left bottom to book / unbook customers, two splitters to separate the panels and a StatusPanel at the bottom.

See Also:
Serialized Form
